history.proof: hauto use: cA_bottom, cA_eq, cA_top, bottom_bottom, bottom_A inv: dim, sumbool.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (cA m k z) = bottom m k z

Premises:
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_
dart = nat : Set
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Md0.k = zero : dim
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
bottom_bottom_2 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> bottom m k (A m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> bottom m k (A_1 m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_bottom_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA m k z)
cA_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
cA_1_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
top_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z

```coq
intros m k z Hinv Hexd.
rewrite (cA_eq m k z Hinv Hexd).
destruct (succ_dec m k z) as [Hsucc|Hnonsucc].
- rewrite (bottom_A m k z Hinv Hsucc).
  apply bottom_bottom.
  assumption.
- rewrite (cA_bottom m k z Hinv Hexd Hnonsucc).
  apply bottom_top_bis.
  assumption.
Qed.

original: intros m k z Hinv Hexd. rewrite (cA_eq m k z Hinv Hexd). destruct (succ_dec m k z) as [Hsucc|Hnonsucc]. - rewrite (bottom_A m k z Hinv Hsucc). apply bottom_bottom. auto. - rewrite (cA_bottom m k z Hinv Hexd Hnonsucc). apply bottom_top_bis. auto.
